Title: Kali A Day #04 || asciinema
Description:
Kail A Day #04 || asciinema
Presented By Binary Brew Works

What's this weird youtube for stdout with no audio and it's copy-pastable? Well asciinema of course! A quick cast on how to install on Kali so you too can make demo's for tools.

Super cool dude:
Marcin Kulik
@sickill
@asciinema

Kali A Day is a short overview of a Kali Linux tool...wait for it...every day. For more follow Binary Brew Works at:
